thread.title: Video: Sonam Kapoor Is At Her Goofiest Best With Boyfriend Anand Ahuja | MissMalini
thread.title_full: Video: Sonam Kapoor Is At Her Goofiest Best With Boyfriend Anand Ahuja | MissMalini

title: Video: Sonam Kapoor Is At Her Goofiest Best With Boyfriend Anand Ahuja | MissMalini
text:
Divya Rao Feb . 22 . 2017 
Sonam Kapoor has been in the news recently for her relationship with boyfriend Anand Ahuja . While the two haven’t blatantly confirmed it, they haven’t denied it either. Anand is often spotted on family holidays and dinners, and the two make no effort to hide it either. 
Sonam shared this hilarious video of her being goofy with her boyfriend on Instagram. Take a look! A post shared by sonamkapoor (@sonamkapoor) on Feb 21, 2017 at 4:29am PST 
Hahaha stay wild, you two! 1
